title: CopyNumberChange
description: An assessment of the copy number of a Location or a Feature within a system (e.g. genome, cell,  etc.) relative to a baseline ploidy.

_id.description: Variation Id. MUST be unique within document.

subject.description: A location for which the number of systemic copies is described.

copy_change.description: MUST be one of "efo:0030069" (complete genomic loss), "efo:0020073" (high-level loss),  "efo:0030068" (low-level loss), "efo:0030067" (loss), "efo:0030064" (regional base ploidy),  "efo:0030070" (gain), "efo:0030071" (low-level gain), "efo:0030072" (high-level gain).
